com.fasterxml.util.membuf.impl

Class ArrayBytesSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.util.membuf.Segment<S>
      • com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base.SegmentBase<BytesSegment>
        • com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base.BytesSegment
          • com.fasterxml.util.membuf.impl.ArrayBytesSegment

  • public class ArrayBytesSegment
extends BytesSegment
    BytesSegment implementation that uses POJAs (Plain Old Java Array) for storing byte sequences.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • readLength

        public int readLength()
        Method for reading as much of the length prefix as possible from the current pointer in this segment. This will be from 0 to 5 bytes, depending on length of prefix, and whether it resides completely in this segment or not.
